alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Western Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:23PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Crook County through 200 PM MDT... At 122 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Alva, or 20 miles north of Sundance. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alva, Bear Lodge Campground and Cook Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Western Crook; Wyoming Black Hills
